page.title: 17Stifford Clays Shops.
page.content: {Germon's Housewares. The family started business in a 13 foot by 8 foot wooden shed.Any excess stock which couldn't go in the shed,was kept in an air raid shelter.The shed is now in the back yard,having been kept for both practical and sentimental reasons. The shop itself was opened in 1953 and has always belonged to the same family.It relies on 2 main suppliers for its excellent range of goods. {Video Shop. This used to be Barton's The Baker's.It became a video shop on the 23rd of December,1984.Members must be at least 18 years of age.About 400-500 films are hired every week,each film costing Â£1 per night.The shop is open 7 days a week for an accumilative total of 70 hours.
